channel.title: Webclient help plzz!

item.title: Webclient help plzz!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Opium10, post:2, topic:350389”]Search for this:

public final class client extends Applet_Sub1 {

Then you should see something like this:

rivate Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 MultiWay; public String censor2 = ""; public boolean censor = true; public String badWords[] = {"no-ip", "proxy", "zapto", "hopto"}; private static final int EXTERNAL_BUFFER_SIZE = 128000; public static int cameratoggle; public static int zoom; public static int lftrit; public static int fwdbwd; public static int secondTime; public static boolean flip = false; public static boolean flip_s = false; public static boolean flip_r = false;
Now add public String serverIP = "SERVERIPHERE";
Under this public String badWords[] = {"no-ip", "proxy", "zapto", "hopto"};[/quote]
I can’t find the code something else?
Im using Combatscape Client
Help me plzz!!

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help plzz!
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

Search for this:

public final class client extends Applet_Sub1 {

Then you should see something like this:

rivate Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 MultiWay; public String censor2 = ""; public boolean censor = true; public String badWords[] = {"no-ip", "proxy", "zapto", "hopto"}; private static final int EXTERNAL_BUFFER_SIZE = 128000; public static int cameratoggle; public static int zoom; public static int lftrit; public static int fwdbwd; public static int secondTime; public static boolean flip = false; public static boolean flip_s = false; public static boolean flip_r = false;
Now add public String serverIP = "SERVERIPHERE";
Under this public String badWords[] = {"no-ip", "proxy", "zapto", "hopto"};

Read full topic

Declare this variable
Code: [Select]
public String serverIP = “SERVERIPHERE”;

anIntArray977 = new int[anInt975]; anIntArray978 = new int[anInt975]; anIntArray979 = new int[anInt975]; anIntArray980 = new int[anInt975]; anIntArray981 = new int[anInt975]; anIntArray982 = new int[anInt975]; port = "43594"; public String serverIP = "127.0.0.1"; //Here is the code look here <- aStringArray983 = new String[anInt975]; anInt985 = -1; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array987 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1[20]; anIntArray990 = new int[5]; aBoolean991 = false; aBoolean994 = false; anInt1002 = 0x23201b; aString1004 = ""; aByte1012 = 24; aClass19_1013 = new Class19(169); aBoolean1017 = false;
